title: Lender
subtitle: Money and debt management app designed for groups.
name: Name
want_make_admin: Do you want to make them an admin?
login_required: You need to log in again!
want_delete: Do you want to revoke the item?
want_expense: Do you want them to pay for it?
members_explanation: See the members of the group and modify your nickname
rename_group_explanation: Rename the group if you don't like the name
shopping_list_explanation: Write on the joint shopping list
history_explanation: Follow, modify and revoke recent transactions
you_are_good: You don't need to pay anyone
fulfill_scf: The element was successfully removed from the list
want_edit: Do you want to modify the item?
discovery_add_floating_description:
Expense:
Enter the amount, if you bought something for one or more members, the then app distributes it evenly between them.

Payment:
Enter an amount if you payed a member.
discovery_drawer_description:
At the top of the menu you can switch between your groups.

Below you can find your personal settings.
discovery_settings_description: Here you can change your username or password, and choose between beautiful color themes.
discover_shopping_description:
Everyone in the group has access to this shopping list

You can use it travelling together or when sharing a flat.
discover_group_settings_description: Amongst other things this menu is used to invite people to the group and to change your nickname.
tutorial_1: Usually there are a lot of unnecessary transactions in a group, because you have to pay every time someone buys you something.
tutorial_2:
Lender simplifies these transactions by making less of them.
Later you'll see that this way you will owe the group instead of single members.
tutorial_3:
In a group everyone has a balance.
Positive balance means the group owes you, while negative means you owe the group.
tutorial_4: You can determine who you should pay by looking at the balances, or alternatively by using the "Who sould I pay?" button.
welcome:
Thank you for registering!

On the next few pages you'll see a short tutorial explaining the usage of the app.
reset_tutorial_explanation: You'll need to restart the app
cannot_connect: Connecting to the server was unsuccessful. Check your internet connection and try again.
format_exception: An error occurred while parsing the data. Please try again.
balance_at_least_0: Your balance needs to be at least 0 to leave the group!
really_kick: If you kick this member, his current balance will be added to your balance. Are you sure you want to kick him?
really_leave: If you leave, your current balance will be split between everyone else. Are you sure you want to leave?
change_username_explanation: Change the username which you use to log in to the app
change_password_explanation: Change the password which you use to log in to the app
change_group_currency_explanation: Change the currency of the group, but note that the balances will not be converted!
manage_guests_explanation: The guests are members controlled by the admins. They are not registered on their own.
add_guest_explanation: Add a new guest to the group
remove_guest_explanation: Remove the chosen guest from the group. In this case the current balance of the guest will be assigned you.
merge_guest_explanation: Remove the chosen guest and assign their past transactions to a real member in the group.
guest_switcher_explanation: Choose the guest whose finances you want to manage.
sure_remove_guest: Are you sure you want to remove them from the group?
needs_choose_guest: A guest needs to be chosen
sure_merge_guest: Are you sure you want to assign the guest to the chosen member?
about_us_explanation: Informations about us and the app
about_us_text:
Two guys bored and making apps like this.

If you buy the pro version, you help out two uni students maintain the app 😉

Take care, your devs
username_explanation: You're going to use the username for logging into the app. Only the english lowecase letters and numbers are allowed. Later you will be able to assign yourself a nickname for each group.
reminder_explanation: We aren't storing you e-mail, so if you forget your password, we will show you this reminder.
must_accept_privacy_policy: You have to accept the privacy policy!
free_trial_ended: The free trial period has ended
free_trial_ended_explanation:
From now on you are going to see ads in the app, and you won't be able to use the gradient themes.
You can buy these through the app.
gradient_available_in_paid_version: You can buy the gradient themes through the app.
version_not_supported_explanation: We updated Lender to a new version. With this change some of the features in your versions will not work.
remove_ads_explanation:
Enjoy Lender in its full reality.
Remove the ads.
group_boost_explanation:
Boost the group member limit to 30 and unlock its statistics.
The bundle contains Dodos enough for 2 groups.
ad_gradient_bundle_explanation:
Enjoy Lender in its full beauty.
Remove ads, unlock gradient themes.
gradients_explanation:
Enjoy Lender in all of its colors.
Unlock the gradient themes. (Our favorite is the orange one ðŸ˜‰)
big_lender_bundle_explanation: This is the small Lender bundle, but we added group-boosting Dodos enough for 1 group.
boost_group_explanation: Increase the group member limit to 30 and keep track of its statistics.
sure_boost: Are you sure you want to boost the group?
already_boosted: This group has already been boosted!
